messages.title: Help me deliver my plan for Beaconsfield. Vote Conservative on 12 December.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Vote for a NEW Member of Parliament
keyPolicies.policyDescription: If you believe that your concerns have been ignored for too long. You deserve a modern, compassionate, forward-thinking candidate.

Extra funding for the NHS. 50 million more GP appointments each year. 50,000 Extra Nurses. Triple Tax Lock – No rise in income tax, VAT, or National Insurance. 20,000 more police officers. Reaching net-zero carbon emissions by 2050 with investment in clean energy solutions.

There is a better way to spend £88 billion for example on our crumbling roads, better local rail links and improving our broadband and 5G. If I cannot achieve the cancellation of HS2, I will challenge HS2 to ensure that it is value for money and observes the highest environmental standards during construction.

mentions.partyLeader: Choosing a working MP will send a message back to Westminster that the future for the UK has to be Conservative and not led by a Momentum government under Corbyn.
mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for me on December 12th means that you want a Conservative Government led by Boris Johnson. A vote for any other person is a vote for a socialist government under Corbyn and unending delay to delivering the democratic result of the referendum.

issues.brexitEurope: Vote Grieve, Get Corbyn. A vote for me is a vote for unity and to end division and delay. My opponent wants to continue the chaos and pessimism of the remain era.
issues.economy: Extra funding for the NHS. 50 million more GP appointments each year. 50,000 Extra Nurses. Triple Tax Lock – No rise in income tax, VAT, or National Insurance. 20,000 more police officers.
issues.environment: Reaching net-zero carbon emissions by 2050 with investment in clean energy solutions.
issues.government: Choosing a working MP will send a message back to Westminster that the future for the UK has to be Conservative and not led by a Momentum government under Corbyn.
issues.health: Extra funding for the NHS. 50 million more GP appointments each year. 50,000 Extra Nurses.

community.content: Parliament is a numbers game and a vote for the independent candidate will greatly increase the risk of Jeremy Corbyn entering No. 10 where he will rely on votes from Nicola Sturgeon’s Scottish National Party.
My campaign is about local issues and local voices, not national grandstanding. Beaconsfield deserves a local champion.
If I cannot achieve the cancellation of HS2, I will challenge HS2 to ensure that it is value for money and observes the highest environmental standards during construction.

politicalExperience.role: Elected as Conservative Women’s Organisation National Treasurer
politicalExperience.achievements: Shortlisted London mayoral candidate, securing the support of more MPs than any other candidate.

politicalExperience.role: Senior Special Advisor to Angie Bray MP and Alok Sharma MP
Former Parliamentary Candidate for Ealing Central and Acton at 2017 General Election

examples: Extra funding for the NHS. 50 million more GP appointments each year. 50,000 Extra Nurses.
Triple Tax Lock – No rise in income tax, VAT, or National Insurance.
Reaching net-zero carbon emissions by 2050 with investment in clean energy solutions.
If you believe that your concerns have been ignored for too long.
You deserve a modern, compassionate, forward-thinking candidate.
Choosing a working MP will send a message back to Westminster that the future for the UK has to be Conservative and not led by a Momentum government under Corbyn.
My campaign is about local issues and local voices, not national grandstanding.

Parliament is a numbers game and a vote for the independent candidate will greatly increase the risk of Jeremy Corbyn entering No. 10 where he will rely on votes from Nicola Sturgeon’s Scottish National Party.
Choosing a working MP will send a message back to Westminster that the future for the UK has to be Conservative and not led by a Momentum government under Corbyn.
Extra funding for the NHS. 50 million more GP appointments each year. 50,000 Extra Nurses.
Triple Tax Lock – No rise in income tax, VAT, or National Insurance.
Choosing a working MP will send a message back to Westminster that the future for the UK has to be Conservative and not led by a Momentum government under Corbyn.
My opponent wants to continue the chaos and pessimism of the remain era.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: I know my way around Westminster.
nonPolicyAttributes.employment: Working Mum, Housing and Social Justice Consultant. Expert in solving housing problems for communities.
nonPolicyAttributes.education: Joy holds an English degree (MSc) degree at the London School of Economics in European Social Policy and speaks fluent French and conversational Serbian. She served as a school governor and as Director of Communications at federated Child's Hill and Claremont Primary Schools in Hampstead, where she played a vital role in protecting these local community schools.
nonPolicyAttributes.family: Her husband is a US Air Force pilot and is a strong supporter of armed services and their families. She is married to a senior US Air Force officer (combat veteran) and is the mother of a local homelessness charity.

examples: Former Parliamentary Candidate for Ealing Central and Acton at 2017 General Election.
